name: Devmode
description: Empty file that gets the p8 to developer mode. Upload this to force developer mode on following uploads, single click on side button when finished uploading all files, to boot into working mode.

name: P8 core
description: P8 Screen driver and init functions. For use with the [flash enabled](https://github.com/fanoush/ds-d6/blob/master/espruino/DFU/P8/espruino_2v07.60_p8_SDK11_SD20_SPIFLASH.zip) or the  the [not flash enabled](https://github.com/fanoush/ds-d6/blob/master/espruino/DFU/P8/espruino_2v07.60_p8_SDK11_SD20.zip) Espruino image  build by fanoush.
